global.command_not_found_description: How dare you asking me about it?!

poll.description: Create 'yes/no' poll. React with üëç for yes, and üëé for no.

alias.description: Add or remove alias for command. To see aliases for command type just command.
alias.word_is_reserved: '{{word}}' is reserved. You are not able to create alias!

debug.description: Set debug flag to provide more/less information about internal work.
debug.call_developers: {{- author}} is trying to kill me! Help me please {{developers}}
debug.internal_error_placeholder: Are you trying to harm me?

developer.description: Add/remove user as a developer to receive debug notifications.

man.description: Shows manual for commands (without arg shows full list).

prefix.description: Change prefix for bot's commands. 'reset' restores default value
prefix.changed_description: Now I'll answer you if you start you message with '{{prefix}}'

wtf.message_description: I'm The Executor and I'm here to rule!

role.description: Allows to get/remove role by reacting on message.
role.not_found_description: And what do you want to do? ü§®
